title: Ponkotsu Fuukiin to Skaato take ga Futekisetsu na JK no Hanashi
description: Sakuradaimon Tougo is the school's prefect. A prefect is a student who is authorized to enforce discipline. As a prefect, he's supposed to be a role model to other students, but unfortunately he's not perfect. Kohinata Poemu is one of the people who Sakuradaimon Tougo has tried to discipline into wearing appropriate school attire, but she has thus far been disobedient.
author: Yokota Takuma
